about.title: About Rolls-Royce Dubai
about.subtitle: Setting the Standard for Luxury Car Rental
about.description: With years of experience in providing exceptional luxury car rental services, we pride ourselves on delivering an unparalleled experience to our distinguished clientele. Our meticulously maintained fleet of Rolls-Royce vehicles represents the pinnacle of automotive luxury.

reasons.price: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: 15 Years of Luxury Excellence in Dubai

introduction.title: Welcome to Rolls-Royce Dubai
introduction.p1: Since 2009, Rolls-Royce Dubai has been the epitome of luxury car rental in the United Arab Emirates. We don't just rent cars; we deliver experiences that embody the spirit of Rolls-Royce – unparalleled luxury, exceptional service, and attention to every detail.
introduction.p2: From a modest beginning with three vehicles, we've grown to become Dubai's most trusted name in luxury transportation, serving royalty, celebrities, business leaders, and discerning travelers from around the world.

review1.name: Ahmed Al-Mansoori
review1.review: The best car rental experience I've had in Dubai. The Phantom was immaculate and the service was first-class. Highly recommended.

review2.name: Fatima Al-Fahim
review2.review: Rented the Cullinan for a family trip. The car was spacious and luxurious, and the chauffeur was very professional and knowledgeable.

review3.name: John Smith
review3.review: Exceptional service from start to finish. The team was very accommodating with my last-minute booking. The Ghost was a dream to drive.

review4.name: Li Wei
review4.review: We hired a fleet of Rolls-Royce cars for a corporate event. The cars were stunning and the logistics were handled perfectly. Impressive.

review5.name: Abdullah Al-Saud
review5.review: The Dawn was the perfect car for a weekend getaway in Dubai. The convertible experience was unforgettable. Excellent service.

review6.name: Sergey Ivanov
review6.review: I am a regular customer and they never disappoint. The cars are always in pristine condition and the staff is very professional.

review7.name: Hans Müller
review7.review: The attention to detail is what sets them apart. From the booking process to the car delivery, everything was seamless.

review8.name: Aisha Khan
review8.review: We rented the Phantom for our wedding. It was the perfect touch of luxury for our special day. The chauffeur was amazing.

review9.name: David Chen
review9.review: The Wraith is a beast! What a car. The team at Rolls-Royce Dubai made the entire process so easy. Will be back for more.

review10.name: Mohammed Al-Jaber
review10.review: I have rented from many luxury car companies in Dubai, but this is by far the best. Their fleet is unmatched.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I join the loyalty program?
faq.a1: You can join our loyalty program by creating an account on our website and opting in.
faq.a2: You earn points for every rental you make with us. The more you rent, the more points you earn.
faq.q3: How do I redeem my points?
faq.a3: You can redeem your points for discounts, upgrades, and other rewards when you make a booking.
faq.a4: No, our loyalty program is completely free to join.
faq.q5: How do I upgrade my tier level?
faq.a5: Tiers are automatically upgraded once you complete the required number of rentals within a calendar year.
faq.a6: Gold and Platinum members receive invitations to exclusive car launches, luxury partner events, and more.
faq.a7: No, loyalty points cannot be transferred from one account to another.
faq.a8: No, our loyalty program is completely free and starts with your first booking.
faq.q9: How do I check my status?
faq.a9: You can view your status and points balance by logging into your account on our website or contacting our customer service team.
faq.q10: What happens if I don't meet tier requirements?
faq.a10: If you don't meet the requirements to maintain your current tier status, you will be adjusted to the next lower tier.

q1.question: What documents do I need to rent?
q1.answer: Valid UAE driving license or international driving permit, passport copy, and Emirates ID (for residents).

q2.question: Can I rent for just a few hours?
q2.answer: Yes! We offer flexible hourly packages starting from 4 hours minimum.

q3.question: Do you provide airport pickup?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We offer complimentary airport pickup and drop-off services.

q4.question: Is insurance included?
q4.answer: Yes, comprehensive insurance is included in all our rental packages.

q1.question: What makes Rolls-Royce unique compared to other luxury brands?
q1.answer: Rolls-Royce stands apart with its uncompromising commitment to craftsmanship, bespoke customization options, and the legendary 'Magic Carpet Ride' that provides unmatched comfort and refinement.

q2.question: Which brand offers better value for money?
q2.answer: Value depends on your priorities. Rolls-Royce offers unparalleled luxury and exclusivity, while brands like Mercedes provide more technology at lower price points. Our comparisons help you determine what matters most to you.

q3.question: Can I test drive multiple brands before deciding?
q3.answer: Yes! We offer test drive experiences for all vehicles in our fleet. Contact our team to arrange consecutive test drives for the best comparison experience.

q4.question: Which brand is best for chauffeur services?
q4.answer: Rolls-Royce is traditionally the gold standard for chauffeur services, offering supreme rear-seat comfort and presence. However, Mercedes S-Class and Bentley also excel in this role with their own unique advantages.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Excellence?
cta.subtitle: Choose your perfect luxury vehicle and begin your journey today

rollsRoyce.summary: Rolls-Royce represents the absolute pinnacle of automotive luxury, where no compromise is made in the pursuit of perfection.

rollsRoyce.title: Unparalleled Opulence
rollsRoyce.summary: Every Rolls-Royce is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, with attention to detail that borders on obsession.

rollsRoyce.summary: Rolls-Royce prioritizes smooth, effortless power delivery over sporting performance, creating a serene driving experience.

rollsRoyce.title: 120 Years of Excellence

bentley.title: Racing Pedigree

rollsRoyce.point1: You want the absolute pinnacle of luxury
rollsRoyce.point3: You prefer being driven over driving
rollsRoyce.point5: Budget is not a primary concern

bentley.title: Choose Bentley If:
bentley.point2: You want luxury with sporting flair

verdict.title: The Verdict
verdict.p1: Both Rolls-Royce and Bentley represent the pinnacle of automotive luxury, but they appeal to different sensibilities. Rolls-Royce is the ultimate choice for those who value absolute luxury, uncompromising comfort, and supreme status. It's for those who appreciate being driven in unparalleled opulence.
verdict.p2: Bentley, on the other hand, offers a perfect blend of luxury and performance for those who don't want to choose between comfort and driving excitement. With its racing heritage and more accessible pricing, Bentley appeals to luxury enthusiasts who want to experience the thrill of driving while enjoying exceptional comfort and craftsmanship.

introduction.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
introduction.description1: At Rolls-Royce Dubai, we understand that your privacy matters. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you use our services or visit our website. We are committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy rights.
introduction.description2: This policy complies with UAE Federal Law No. 45 of 2021 on Personal Data Protection and international privacy standards including GDPR where applicable.

personalInfo.subtitle: Personal Information
items: Full name and contact details (email, phone, address)
Date of birth and nationality
Driving license details and passport/ID information
Credit card and payment information
Booking history and preferences

automaticInfo.subtitle: Automatic Information
items: IP address and device information
Browser type and language preferences
Pages visited and time spent on our site
Referral URLs
Location data (with your consent)

serviceDelivery.subtitle: Service Delivery
items: Process rental bookings and payments
Verify driving license and identity
Send booking confirmations and updates
Provide customer support and assistance
Handle insurance claims if necessary

businessOperations.subtitle: Business Operations
items: Improve our services and site functionality
Send promotional offers and newsletters (with your consent)
Conduct market research and analytics
Prevent fraud and ensure security
Comply with legal and regulatory requirements

shareWith.subtitle: We may share your information with:
items: Insurance providers for coverage purposes
Government authorities as required by law
Payment processors to handle transactions
Marketing partners (only with your consent)
Service providers who assist in our operations

neverDo.subtitle: We will never:
items: Sell your personal information to third parties
Share sensitive data without your explicit consent
Use your information for undisclosed purposes
Transfer data to countries without adequate protection

securityMeasures.subtitle: Security Measures
items: SSL encryption for all data transmissions
Secure servers with firewall protection
Regular security audits and updates
Limited access to personal information
PCI DSS compliance for payment processing

rights.subtitle: You have the right to:
items: Access your personal information we hold
Request correction of inaccurate data
Request deletion of your information
Opt-out of marketing communications
Withdraw consent at any time
File a complaint with data protection authorities

cookiesUsage.subtitle: We use cookies for:
items: Essential website functionality
Remembering your preferences
Analytics and performance tracking
Personalized content and advertisements
Social media integration

retentionPeriods.subtitle: Retention Periods
items: Booking information: 7 years for legal compliance
Marketing data: Until consent withdrawal
Website analytics: 2 years
Payment records: As required by financial regulations
Camera recordings: 30 days (office and vehicle cameras)

crossBorderData.subtitle: Cross-Border Data
items: Data may be processed in countries where we operate
We ensure adequate protection for international transfers
EU-UAE data transfer agreements are respected
You can request information about transfer safeguards

ageRestrictions.subtitle: Age Restrictions
items: Our services are not intended for children under 18
We do not knowingly collect data from minors
Parents can contact us to remove such data
Age verification is required for all rentals

policyChanges.subtitle: Policy Changes
items: We may update this policy periodically
Significant changes will be notified via email
Continued use constitutes acceptance of updates
Previous versions are available upon request

contact.title: Data Protection Officer
contact.description: For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer:

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.description: By using our services, you consent to:
items: Collection and processing of your personal data as described
Use of cookies and similar technologies
Data transfers as necessary to provide service
Receiving service communications and updates
consent.withdrawal: You can withdraw your consent at any time by contacting our Data Protection Officer.

cta.title: Your Privacy is Our Priority
cta.description: We are committed to protecting your personal information and providing transparency in how we handle your data.

terms.introduction: Welcome to Rolls-Royce Dubai. These Terms and Conditions set forth the rules and regulations for the use of our luxury car rental services. By accessing our services and renting a vehicle, you accept these Terms and Conditions in full. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

rentalAgreement.title: 1. Rental Agreement
content: Rental period begins upon vehicle delivery or pickup.
Extensions must be agreed upon 24 hours in advance.
Early return is subject to full rental period charges.
All rentals require signed agreement and valid documents.

driverRequirements.title: 2. Driver Requirements
content: Minimum age of 25 years for all luxury vehicles.
Valid UAE driving license or international driving license required.
Clean driving record with no major violations in the past 3 years.
Additional drivers must be pre-approved and meet all requirements.

securityDeposit.title: 3. Security Deposit
content: Security deposit of AED 10,000-25,000 depending on vehicle model.
Deposit is fully refundable upon safe return of vehicle.
Deposit refund processing time is 14-21 business days.
Deposit covers minor damages and traffic fines.

insuranceCoverage.title: 4. Insurance Coverage
content: Comprehensive insurance included with all rentals.
Additional liability of AED 5,000-15,000 depending on vehicle.
Insurance does not cover negligent or reckless driving.
Personal belongings are not covered under vehicle insurance.

usageRestrictions.title: 5. Usage Restrictions
content: Vehicles must not be used for racing, rallying, or any illegal activities.
Smoking is strictly prohibited in all vehicles.
Pets are not allowed without prior approval and additional fees.
Cross-border travel requires special permission and documentation.

fuelPolicy.title: 6. Fuel Policy
content: Vehicles are provided with a full tank of premium fuel.
Vehicles must be returned with the same fuel level.
Refueling charges apply at AED 10 per liter plus service fees.
Only premium fuel should be used (98 octane or higher).

mileageAllowance.title: 7. Mileage Allowance
content: Daily rental includes 250km per day.
Weekly rental includes 1,500km per week.
Monthly rental includes 4,500km per month.
Excess mileage is charged at AED 15 per kilometer.

cancellationPolicy.title: 8. Cancellation Policy
content: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before rental start.
50% charge for cancellation within 24-48 hours.
Full charge for cancellation within 24 hours.
No-show results in forfeiture of full rental amount.

trafficFines.title: 9. Traffic Fines and Violations
content: Renter is responsible for all traffic fines during rental period.
Administrative fee of AED 250 per violation.
Fines will be deducted from security deposit or credit card.
Serious violations may result in immediate rental termination.

vehicleReturn.title: 10. Vehicle Return
content: Vehicles must be returned at agreed time and location.
Late return is charged hourly plus 50% additional fees.
Vehicle must be returned in same condition as delivered.
Cleaning fees apply for excessively dirty vehicles (AED 500+).

liability.title: 11. Liability and Indemnification
content: Renter assumes full responsibility for vehicle during rental period.
Company is not liable for personal injury or property damage.
Renter indemnifies company against all claims and losses.
Maximum liability is limited to security deposit amount.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
content: These terms are governed by UAE federal laws and Dubai local laws.
Disputes are resolved through Dubai courts.
English version of terms prevails in case of translation conflict.
Invalid provisions do not affect other terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: For questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By proceeding with rental, you acknowledge that you have:
items: Read and understood these Terms and Conditions
Agree to comply with these terms
Meet all eligibility requirements
Will comply with all applicable laws and regulations

cta.disclaimer: By booking, you agree to these Terms and Conditions

seasonalPricing.disclaimer: * Prices subject to availability and may vary during special events

priceCalculator.title: Calculate Your Total Cost
priceCalculator.subtitle: Use our calculator to estimate your rental cost including all services

priceGuarantee.title: Best Price Guarantee
priceGuarantee.subtitle: Find a lower price for the same Rolls-Royce rental in Dubai? We'll match it and give you an additional 5% discount.

priceMatch.title: Price Match
priceMatch.description: We match any verified competitor price

included.question: What is included in the rental price?
included.answer: All prices include comprehensive insurance, 250km daily mileage allowance, VAT, and 24/7 roadside assistance. Fuel is not included.

deposit.question: Are there any security deposits?
deposit.answer: Yes, a refundable security deposit of AED 5,000-10,000 is required depending on the vehicle model. This is held on your credit card.

discounts.question: Can I get a discount for longer rentals?
discounts.answer: Yes! Weekly rentals get 15% off, monthly rentals 30% off, and 3+ months up to 40% off the daily rate.

holidays.question: Do prices change during holidays?
holidays.answer: Prices may increase 20-25% during peak season (November-March) and major events. Book early for best rates.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Luxury?
cta.subtitle: Book your Rolls-Royce today and enjoy the best rates in Dubai

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Answers to all your questions about Rolls-Royce rental in Dubai
faqPage.description: Learn everything you need to know about renting luxury Rolls-Royce vehicles

questions.q1: How do I book a Rolls-Royce in Dubai?
questions.a1: Booking is simple! You can book online through our website, call us at +971 55 816 4922, or send us a WhatsApp message. We recommend booking at least 48 hours in advance to ensure availability of your preferred vehicle.
questions.q2: Can I book a Rolls-Royce for the same day?
questions.a2: Yes, same-day bookings are possible subject to availability. However, we recommend booking in advance to secure your preferred vehicle. For urgent bookings, please call us directly for immediate assistance.
questions.q3: How far in advance should I book?
questions.a3: For the best selection and guaranteed availability, we recommend booking at least 3-7 days in advance. During peak seasons (November to March) and for special events, booking 2-4 weeks ahead is advisable.
questions.q4: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
questions.a4: Yes, modifications are free up to 48 hours before your rental. Cancellations made 48+ hours in advance receive a full refund. Cancellations within 24-48 hours incur a 50% charge, and within 24 hours are non-refundable.
questions.q5: What are the requirements to rent a Rolls-Royce?
questions.a5: You need a valid driving license, passport, credit card, and minimum age of 25 years. International licenses are accepted for up to 30 days, after which you need a UAE license.
questions.q6: Do I need an international driving license?
questions.a6: If you're a tourist, you can use your local license for up to 30 days. For longer stays, you'll need an international driving permit or UAE license.
questions.q7: What is the minimum age for rental?
questions.a7: The minimum age is 25 years. Drivers aged 21-24 can rent with additional young driver fees and higher security deposit.
questions.q8: What does the rental price include?
questions.a8: All prices include comprehensive insurance, daily 250km mileage allowance, VAT, and 24/7 roadside assistance. Fuel is not included.
questions.a9: Yes, a refundable security deposit of AED 5,000-10,000 is required depending on the vehicle model. This is held on your credit card.
questions.q10: Can I get discounts for long-term rentals?
questions.a10: Yes! Weekly rentals get 15% discount, monthly 30%, and 3+ months up to 40% off the daily rate.
questions.a11: Our fleet includes Phantom, Ghost, Cullinan, Dawn, and Wraith. All vehicles are latest models equipped with the newest luxury features.
questions.q12: Can I choose the vehicle color?
questions.a12: Yes, we have a range of colors available for each model. Specific colors are subject to availability, so we recommend early booking for preferred colors.
questions.a13: All our vehicles are latest models (typically less than 3 years old) and maintained to the highest standards at authorized Rolls-Royce centers.
questions.a14: Yes, we offer professional chauffeur service for AED 1,500 per day. Our drivers are experienced, courteous, and speak multiple languages.
questions.a15: Yes, we provide free delivery and collection in Dubai, and for nominal fees to other emirates. We'll deliver the vehicle to your preferred location.
questions.q16: Can I rent for special occasions?
questions.a16: Absolutely! We offer special packages for weddings, corporate events, photoshoots, and special occasions. Call us for custom quotes.
questions.a17: You receive the vehicle with a full tank and must return it in the same condition. If not returned full, we charge refueling fees plus service charges.
questions.q18: What happens in case of an accident?
questions.a18: All our vehicles are fully insured. In case of an accident, contact us immediately. You'll be responsible for the deductible amount as mentioned in the contract.
questions.q19: Can I drive the vehicle outside Dubai?
questions.a19: Yes, you can drive throughout the UAE. For travel outside the country, please inform us in advance for necessary approvals.
questions.a20: We're available 24/7 for emergencies and customer service. Regular office hours are 8 AM to 10 PM, 7 days a week.

contactCta.title: Didn't find the answer to your question?
contactCta.description: Our team is ready to help you
